content: *need something cool and airy to add a splash of color to your summer wardrobe this easy biased scarf is your perfect one-skein summer knitting project * **finished dimensions** 9 5 13 5 wide x 80 long **yarn** anzula milky way 80% milk protien 20% superwash merino 500 yds / 4oz 1 skein for smaller size anzula mermaid 60% sea cell 40% silk 700 yds / 4 oz 1 skein shown in country green for larger size **needles** us 6 4mm needles **gauge** 18 sts x 32 row = 4 x 4 in eyelet pattern **notions** tapestry needle blocking wires & pins optional
